verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) I Will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> From <S%H370>whence<s%> shall my <S%H5828>help<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>?
He will not <S%H5414>allow<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> to <S%H4131>slip;<s%> He who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> you will not <S%H5123>slumber.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is your <S%H8104>keeper;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is your <S%H6738>shade<s%> on your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> will not <S%H5221>smite<s%> you by <S%H3119>day,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H8104>protect<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9563>evil;<s%> He will <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H8104>guard<s%> your <S%H3318>going<s%> out and your <S%H935>coming<s%> in From <S%H6258>this<s%> <S%H6258>time<s%> forth and <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
